description.value:
You strike a foe with force to prevent them from reacting. Strike a creature. If you hit, the creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)] saving throw against your class DC. If your Strike was a critical hit, the result of their save is one degree of success worse.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature can't use reactions against an ally you designate until the beginning of their next turn.

Failure The creature can't use reactions until the beginning of their next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.
